summary: Adding a whole new Skyrim landscape and questing. Follow the main quest-line or venture out and forge your own name!
descriptionHtml:
Long before the age of men, elves and dwemer reigned the divines and god\'s of old. Cataclysmic events were shaping Tamriel as we know it. The god\'s created beings as puppets to create new life: to create lesser beings. However, whilst the creation of angels and heroic beings were forged in light, dark and mysterious magics were plaguing the world. 
The god\'s were distracted with their own life forms that they had not realised that other powerful, behemoth like beings were being created...
The Dathrohan\'s were alive. In fact, they were more than just alive, they were thriving. 
Demonic beings, far different from the Daedra had been forged, beings almost as powerful as the ancient god\'s of old. 

The immovable object had met the unstoppable force.

The god\'s had met the Dathrohan\'s.
author: Vobur
